category.name: Rich Client
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: Sc0LineItemColumnPreference
preference.preference_description: Specifies the list of properties that can be displayed in the "Line Item Collection" view in the Supplier Collaboration application. Valid values are in the format "ObjectTypeInternalName.PropertyInternalName", where the object must be of type "Bid Package Line Item" (BidPackageLineItem) or any of its subtypes.
